T02D1991:187a-1: shr'i badzra s'a ra sva ti s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D1991:187a-3: dpal rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D1991:187a-4: dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1991:187a-5: zla ba ltar gsal blo ngan bsreg / dug 'joms gzhan dbang byed mar grags //
T02D1991:187a-6: bde ba phun sum tshogs ster ma /
T02D1991:187a-7: dpal ldan ma la gus phyag 'tshal //
T02D1991:187a-8: dur khrod la sogs pa yid dang mthun pa'i gnas
T02D1991:187a-9: su dam tshig la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i sngags
T02D1991:187a-11: mandala byug pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02D1991:187a-12: stan bde ba la 'dug par bya'o //
T02D1991:187a-13: rang gi snying ga'i chu skyes la aa las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor blta'o //
T02D1991:187a-14: de'i steng du hr'i: dkar po'i 'od zer gyis nam
T02D1991:187a-15: mkhar bla ma dang rdo rje dbyangs can ma la
T02D1991:187a-16: sogs pa yang dag par bltas la /
T02D1991:187a-17: snying ga'i sa bon las aa 'thon pa'i lha mo
T02D1991:187a-18: rnams kyis mchod yon la sogs pas yang dag par
T02D1991:187a-19: mchod nas / sdig pa la sogs pa bshags par bya'o //
T02D1991:187a-20: yang byams pa la sogs pa yang bsgom par bya ba nyid do //
T02D1991:187a-21: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ;
T02D1991:187a-22: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02D1991:187a-23: zhes bya bas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur rang gi rig pas shes par bya'o //
T02D1991:187a-24: yang snying ga'i sa bon gyis bsdus te dmigs pa med par bya'o //
T02D1991:187a-25: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1991:187a-27: de nas sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran pas rang gi sems bam gyi rnam pa /
T02D1991:187a-28: de yongs su gyur pa las padma dmar po /
T02D1991:187a-29: de'i steng du aa las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge hr'i: dkar po blta'o //
T02D1991:187a-30: de las 'od zer 'phros shing bsdus te yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1991:187a-31: bdag nyid rdo rje dbyangs can ma ston ka'i zla
T02D1991:187b-0: ba @187b ltar dkar ba padma dkar po dang zla
T02D1991:187b-1: ba'i steng na g-yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa /
T02D1991:187b-2: phyag g-yas rdo rje gri gug bsnams pas rmongs pa'i dra ba gcod par mdzad ma /
T02D1991:187b-3: g-yon pa bdud bzhi'i khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa bsnams pa spyan gsum dmar la zlum pa /
T02D1991:187b-4: lo bcu drug gi cha byang can /
T02D1991:187b-5: cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal /
T02D1991:187b-9: cod pan rdo rje thod can gyis brgyus pas mdzes pa /
T02D1991:187b-14: sum khugs su 'khyog cing spyod pa'i ba dan gyis dgyes pa /
T02D1991:187b-15: rus rgyu ma la brgyus pa'i mi mgo rlon pa khrag dang bcas pa'i phreng ba 'chang ba /
T02D1991:187b-16: gcer bu bskal pa'i me ltar gzi brjid 'bar ba /
T02D1991:187b-17: sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams can /
T02D1991:187b-18: me long gi gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa /
T02D1991:187b-19: sprul pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don la brtson pa /
T02D1991:187b-20: thugs kar padma dmar po la zla ba'i steng du hr'i: dkar po bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1991:187b-21: de nas bdag gi thugs ka'i sa bon gyi 'od
T02D1991:187b-22: zer gyis yang dag par bskul ba'i lha mo mdun
T02D1991:187b-24: mchod nas bdag nyid la gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1991:187b-25: yang sa bon des bskul ba'i mi bskyod pa la
T02D1991:187b-26: sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mdun du spyan drangs
T02D1991:187b-28: spyi bor sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i 'od dpag med kyis rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02D1991:187b-29: de nas mchod pa rnams kyis bdag nyid la yang mchod par bya ste /
T02D1991:187b-31: de bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyangs can ma nyid do zhes nga rgyal brtan par bya'o //
T02D1991:187b-32: yang rang gi snying gar padma dmar po dang /
T02D1991:187b-33: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la hr'i: bsgoms te /
T02D1991:187b-34: de las sngags kyi phreng ba dkar po zhal nas 'thon pa de'i 'od zer gyis /
T02D1991:187b-35: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab dang ye shes dang yon tan gyi tshogs dang /
T02D1991:187b-36: sngags dang sman dang nor bu dang bstan bcos dang
T02D1991:187b-37: sgyu rtsal la sogs pa'i nus pa dang stobs rnams
T02D1991:187b-38: blangs te snying ga nas 'jug cing /
T02D1991:187b-39: bdag dang gzhan gyi mi shes pa'i mun pa dang /
T02D1991:188a-0: rmongs pa'i mun pa thams cad bsreg @188a * //
T02D1991:188a-1: pa'i bdag nyid du bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1991:188a-2: de ltar ji srid 'dod kyi bar du bsgoms te /
T02D1991:188a-3: spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rnal 'byor gyis myur ba
T02D1991:188a-4: la sogs pa'i skyon rnams dang bral bas sngags bzlas
T02D1991:188a-6: ldang bar 'dod na sngags kyi phreng ba hr'i: yig la bstims la mchod pa dang /
T02D1991:188a-7: gsol ba gdab ste yi ge brgya pa brjod cing /
T02D1991:188a-8: bsod nams yongs su bsngos te /
T02D1991:188a-9: lha mo'i nga rgyal gyis ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o //
T02D1991:188a-10: thun gzhan la yang thams cad de bzhin du bya'o //
T02D1991:188a-11: mtshan phyed kyi thun la yang thams cad de bzhin du byas nas /
T02D1991:188a-12: seng ge'i nyal stabs kyis lha dang bla ma yid la byed cing nyal bar bya'o //
T02D1991:188a-13: blo brtan pos 'bum phrag bcu bzlas na 'grub par the tshom med do //
T02D1991:188a-14: bstan bcos thams cad shes par 'gyur ro //
T02D1991:188a-15: sgyu rtsal thams cad la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1991:188a-17: 'khor gyis kyang zil gyis mi non pa dang /
T02D1991:188a-22: sngags grub pa las thod le skor la sngags btab ste /
T02D1991:188a-23: gang la byin pa de blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T02D1991:188a-24: yang dag pa'i lta ba rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1991:188a-25: thabs shes rab zung 'jug gi ye shes phyag rgya chen po mngon du 'gyur ro //
T02D1991:188a-26: dug gi gnod pa zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1991:188a-28: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D1991:188a-29: dug sprul la sogs pas nye bar mi nus so //
T02D1991:188a-30: 'dis nye bar gtses pa gzhan rnams la yang phan par 'gyur ro //
T02D1991:188a-31: dpal rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1991:188a-32: grub thob kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1991:188a-34: // / rgya gar gyi pandi ta chen po rgyal ba'i sras dpal bi bh'u ti tsandra dang /
T02D1991:188a-35: glo bo lo ts'a ba dge slong shes rab rin
T02D1991:188a-36: chen gyis chos kyi rgyal po'i pho brang sku mkhar
T02D1991:188a-37: nyi gzungs su bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o//
